title: Head Girls Volleyball Coach (no teaching assignment)
description: This Head Girls Volleyball coaching assignment is for the 2026-2027 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Jason Brooks, at Jason.brooks@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.
